Psalms__81.1: A psalm for Asaph. God hath stood in the congregation of gods: and being in the midst of them he judgeth gods.
Psalms__81.2: How long will you judge unjustly: and accept the persons of the wicked?
Psalms__81.3: Judge for the needy and fatherless: do justice to the humble and the poor.
Psalms__81.4: Rescue the poor; and deliver the needy out of the hand of the sinner.
Psalms__81.5: They have not known nor understood: they walk on in darkness: all the foundations of the earth shall be moved.
Psalms__81.6: I have said: You are gods and all of you the sons of the most High.
Psalms__81.7: But you like men shall die: and shall fall like one of the princes.
Psalms__81.8: Arise, O God, judge thou the earth: for thou shalt inherit among all the nations.
